ygData.subject: Re: Fire Fingers
ygData.msgSnippet: Doh!  I should spend a little more time reading the messages.  Doh! Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony ... From:	McCartney, Michael R
ygData.messageBody:
Doh! I should spend a little more time reading the messages. Doh!

Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R [SMTP:Michael.McCartney2@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 2:43 PM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Fire Fingers

From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>

He's talking about PB spells. (player based) like the ones that only affect you, and the surrounding enemies take damage...

Yes. AE spells are mainly cast on the "tank"... but PB spells are automatically on yourself.

Drev

> ----------
> From: Windows/BrownG/bryson on behalf of Valacian[SMTP:abryson@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 1:38 PM
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Re: Fire Fingers
>
> You should not be targeting the NPC's when using the AE spells. You should be targetting your "tank".
>
> Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
>
>
